content: A self-titled album by which British rock band, known for their song "Bohemian Rhapsody", became one of the best-selling albums in UK Chart history?

The self-titled album you're referring to is by the British rock band Queen. Their eponymous album, released in 1973, features the iconic song "Bohemian Rhapsody." This album has indeed achieved significant commercial success and is celebrated for its innovative approach to rock music.
